GSD.description:
ntfs: check overflow when iterating ATTR_RECORDs

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.14.300 by commit 86f36de14dce5802856bb7a5921d74439db00b64. For more details please see the references link.
